name: hd-kiosk
description: An Electron application with Vue and TypeScript
author: example.com

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build:ev: cross-env VITE_KIOSK_MODE=ev-screen npm run build && electron-builder --win --config.productName="HD Kiosk EV" --config.appId="com.hdkiosk.ev" --config.win.executableName="HD Kiosk EV" --config.nsis.shortcutName="HD Kiosk EV" --config.artifactName="HD-Kiosk-EV-Setup-${version}.exe" --config.publish.channel="latest-ev" --config.directories.output="dist/ev" --publish always
scripts.build:did: cross-env VITE_KIOSK_MODE=did npm run build && electron-builder --win --config.productName="HD Kiosk DID" --config.appId="com.hdkiosk.did" --config.win.executableName="HD Kiosk DID" --config.nsis.shortcutName="HD Kiosk DID" --config.artifactName="HD-Kiosk-DID-Setup-${version}.exe" --config.publish.channel="latest-did" --config.directories.output="dist/did" --publish always
